snippet.title: Sonic Gaiden Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Sonic Gaiden! A large scale Mania mod that is currently in the works. Our plan is to bring 10 new and original zones, a brand new soundtrack, a new story and much more. Built off of Sonic Mania, it will be a mod everyone can play.

Please come by and join us on Discord and follow me on Twitter for more info. 
Twiter
https://twitter.com/AeroArtwork

Discord https://discordapp.com/invite/V8KD7YJ
More info coming soon! 

Trailer Song 
Puppy Raceway by Hyper Potions
